name: Sarracenia purpurea

Eyes: Black objects move with the eye
Stomach: Hungry all the time, even after a meal
Back: Pains shooting in ZIGZAG course from lumbar region to middle of scapula
Skin: Variola, aborts the disease, arrests pustulation
Extremities: Limbs weak; bruised pain in knees and hip-joints

details: A remedy for variola. Visual disorders. Congestion to head, with irregular heart action. Chlorosis. Contains a very active proteolytic enzyme. Sick headache; throbbing in various parts, especially in neck, shoulders and head, which feels full to bursting.
